get.summary: Get message thread information from payer system.
get.description: This API provides a summary of the message thread with most recent message information

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: member id to retrieve the list of message threads associated with the specific member.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Filters for message threads by username.

parameters.name: case_number
parameters.description: Filters for message threads by case number. Multiple case numbers can be supported.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filters for message threads by tag

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filters for message threads by category

parameters.name: is_archived
parameters.description: Filters for message threads that have been archived

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: Policy id (internal system identifier) that this message thread is associated with.

200.description: provides list of message threads associated with the member.

count.description: Count representing the total number of objects available to be returned in the results array

next.description: query identifier defined by the api developer for getting the next set of records

previous.description: query identifier defined by the api developer for getting the previous set of records
